Posts.Content: Here you go! Hopefully the link below will take you straight there. It helped me realise my feelings and worries were and are normal. We have to find a new normal so that we can forward. We don't forget what we've been through ... it just becomes more manageable so that we can learn to appreciate the truly important things in life. Hugs to you all xxx   After the treatment is over - Dr Peter Harvey
Posts.Title: Getting back to "normal"

Posts.Content: There's a really good article that I found really helpful. I hope it helps you all too.  I tried to add it as a link but am not able to - but if you google it you should find it. Hugs xxx     After the Treatment Finishes - Then What? Dr Peter Harvey Consultant Clinical Psychologist Leeds Teaching Hospitals Trust
Posts.Title: Getting back to "normal"
